author: AndrewLevin
body: This is a backport of my recent pull request https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24763 which updates the POWHEG EmissionVeto1 userhook for the WGamma special case. It was also necessary to backport the pull request https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23469/ since  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24763 is built on top of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23469. @grohsjea and @agrohsje, please check that I backported your pull request properly.
title: Backport of POWHEG EmissionVeto1 updates
